text: Phyllis Dawson (born July 27, 1957) is an American equestrian. She competed in two events at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:American female equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of the United States Category:Equestrians at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Fairfax, Virginia
title: Phyllis Dawson
